definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: PRONOUNCE】The teacher pronounced each word slowly.
sentences.chinese: 老師把每一個字音都讀得很慢。

sentences.english: Audacity - free, open source, cross platform digital audio editor.
sentences.chinese: 免費，開源，跨平臺數字音頻編輯器。

sentences.english: The proposed algorithm can extract the watermark without the help from the original digital audio signal.
sentences.chinese: 該算法提取水印信息時不需要原始數字音頻信號。

sentences.english: Synchronization is an important problem of digital audio watermarking.
sentences.chinese: 同步性是數字音頻水印的一個重要問題。

sentences.english: In this paper, the theory and design methods of digital audio signal processor for digital recorder (DAT. DCC)are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文以高保真數字音頻信號處理器的設計爲核心。

sentences.english: When consonants occur together in clusters, special conjunct letters are used.
sentences.chinese: 當字音成竄出現的時候，需要使用特殊的連結字母。

sentences.english: So it can be used in many high quality digital audio compression programs.
sentences.chinese: 可以用於多種形式的商質量數字音頻壓縮方案。

sentences.english: Supports files with Dolby Digital audio.
sentences.chinese: 支持檔案與杜比數字音頻。

definition: pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
the final of a Chinese syllable (the component of a syllable remaining after removal of the initial consonant, if any, and the tone, e.g. the final of "niáng" is "iang")
consonant/the initial consonant (of a Chinese syllable)
character with two or more readings
retroflex sound (e.g. in Mandarin zh, ch, sh, r)
entering tone/checked tone/one of the four tones of Middle Chinese
velar nasal/consonant ng or ŋ produced in the nose with the back of the tongue against the soft palate
reading or phonetic value of a character
